description: The Gulf Coast Claims Facility ("GCCF") Transition Process is now closed. The Court Supervised Settlement Program began on June 4, 2012. You may still reach the GCCF Transition Process to inquire about GCCF Transition Process payments (including reissue requests and 1099s).\n\nOfficial Court-Authorized Settlement website at www.deepwaterhorizoneconomicsettlement.com
name: GULF COAST CLAIMS FACILITY
